languages.text: "Эти штуки нужно наполнить техножрецами с высокой пси-чувствительностью? Хорошо, но зачем использовать для этого наших слуг? Поищите на удаленных станциях и постах тех, кто сослан в глушь за негодность, и найдете в три раза больше подходящих кандидатов, чем в мануфакторумах нашего мира. Пси-восприимчивость редко сопутствует высокой рациональности, и такие техножрецы часто заканчивают карьеру в глуши".

"These things need to be filled with high psi-sensitivity Tech-Priests? Sure, but why use our servants? Look on remote stations and outposts for those who were banished as unfit, and you will find three times as many more suitable candidates than in the manufactorums. Psi-receptivity rarely goes hand in hand with high rationality, and such Tech-Priests often end their careers in the wilderness."
languages.original_text: "Эти штуки нужно наполнить техножрецами с высокой пси-чувствительностью? Хорошо, но зачем использовать для этого наших слуг? Поищите на удаленных станциях и постах тех, кто сослан в глушь за негодность, и найдете в три раза больше подходящих кандидатов, чем в мануфакторумах нашего мира. Пси-восприимчивость редко сопутствует высокой рациональности, и такие техножрецы часто заканчивают карьеру в глуши".

traits.locale_text: "These things need to be filled with high psi-sensitivity Tech-priests? Okay, but why use our servants? Look on the remote stations and outposts for those who were banished into the wilderness as unfit, and you shall find three times as many more suitable candidates than in the manufactoriums of our planet. The psi-receptivity rarely goes hand in hand with high rationality, and such tech-priests often end their careers in the wilderness."

"These things need to be filled with high psi-sensitivity Tech-priests? Okay, but why use our servants? Look on the remote stations and outposts for those who were banished into the wilderness as unfit, and you shall find three times as many more suitable candidates than in the manufactoriums of our planet. The psi-receptivity rarely goes hand in hand with high rationality, and such tech-priests often end their careers in the wilderness."

"These things need to be filled with high psi-sensitivity Tech-Priests? Okay, but why use our servants? Look in the remote stations and outposts for those who were banished into the wilderness as unfit, and there you shall find three times as many more suitable candidates than in the manufactorums. Psi-receptivity rarely goes hand in hand with high rationality, and such Tech-Priests often end their careers in the wilderness."

Look in the remote stations and outposts for those who were banished into the wilderness as unfit, and there you shall find three times as many more suitable candidates than in the manufactorums. Psi-receptivity rarely goes hand in hand with high rationality, and such Tech-Priests often end their careers in the wilderness."

Look on remote stations and outposts for those who were banished as unfit, and you will find three times as many more suitable candidates than in the manufactorums. Psi-receptivity rarely goes hand in hand with high rationality, and such Tech-Priests often end their careers in the wilderness."

languages.text: “这玩意还需要配备拥有灵能感应能力的技术神甫？行吧，但为什么要用我们自己的仆人呢？去在偏远的星站和前哨站，寻找那些无法融入社会，被放逐到荒凉地带的人吧。那里的合适人选，比制造工厂的人选要多上两三倍。拥有灵能感应能力的人，很少能拥有出色的理性。像这种擅长感应灵能的技术神甫，往往会在荒原中结束他们的职业生涯。”
languages.original_text: "These things need to be filled with high psi-sensitivity Tech-Priests? Okay, but why use our servants? Look in the remote stations and outposts for those who were banished into the wilderness as unfit, and there you shall find three times as many more suitable candidates than in the manufactorums. Psi-receptivity rarely goes hand in hand with high rationality, and such Tech-Priests often end their careers in the wilderness."

traits.locale_text: “这玩意还需要配备拥有灵能感应能力的技术祭司？行吧，但为什么要用我们自己的仆人呢？去在偏远的星站和前哨站，寻找那些无法融入社会，被放逐到荒凉地带的人吧。那里的合适人选，比制造工厂的人选要多上两三倍。拥有灵能感应能力的人，很少能拥有出色的理性。像这种擅长感应灵能的技术祭司，往往会在荒原中结束他们的职业生涯。”

languages.text: «¿Hay que llenar estas cosas con tecnosacerdotes con sensibilidad psíquica? De acuerdo, pero ¿por qué utilizar a nuestros sirvientes? Busque en las estaciones remotas y en los puestos avanzados a aquellos que fueron desterrados a las zonas salvajes por no ser dignos, y allí encontrará tres veces más candidatos que en los manufactorums. La psi-receptividad rara vez va de la mano de una alta racionalidad, y tales tecnosacerdotes a menudo terminan sus carreras en el ostracismo».
languages.original_text: "These things need to be filled with high psi-sensitivity Tech-Priests? Okay, but why use our servants? Look in the remote stations and outposts for those who were banished into the wilderness as unfit, and there you shall find three times as many more suitable candidates than in the manufactorums. Psi-receptivity rarely goes hand in hand with high rationality, and such Tech-Priests often end their careers in the wilderness."

traits.locale_text: «¿Hay que llenar estas cosas con tecnosacerdotes con sensibilidad psíquica? De acuerdo, pero ¿por qué utilizar a nuestros sirvientes? Busque en las estaciones remotas y en los puestos avanzados a aquellos que fueron desterrados a las zonas salvajes por no ser dignos, y allí encontrará tres veces más candidatos que en los manufactorums. La psi-receptividad rara vez va de la mano de una alta racionalidad, y tales tecnosacerdotes a menudo terminan sus carreras en el ostracismo».

languages.text: 「これらの事に超能力感度の高い技術司祭を使用する必要があるでしょうか？いいでしょう、ではなぜ我が従者を使うのですか？遠隔地にある基地や前哨基地で不適格者として荒野に追放された者を探せば、聖工場より3倍も多くの適した候補者が見つかると思いますよ。超能力受容性と高い合理性とは密接に関わっていることなどほとんどなく、そのような技術司祭は荒野で自らのキャリアを終えることが多いようです」
languages.original_text: "These things need to be filled with high psi-sensitivity Tech-Priests? Okay, but why use our servants? Look in the remote stations and outposts for those who were banished into the wilderness as unfit, and there you shall find three times as many more suitable candidates than in the manufactorums. Psi-receptivity rarely goes hand in hand with high rationality, and such Tech-Priests often end their careers in the wilderness."

traits.locale_text: 「これらの事に超能力感度の高い技術司祭を使用する必要があるでしょうか？いいでしょう、ではなぜ我が従者を使うのですか？遠隔地にある基地や前哨基地で不適格者として荒野に追放された者を探せば、聖工場より3倍も多くの適した候補者が見つかると思いますよ。超能力受容性と高い合理性とは密接に関わっていることなどほとんどなく、そのような技術司祭は荒野で自らのキャリアを終えることが多いようです」

languages.text: « Ces choses ont besoin de technoprêtres hautement sensibles aux énergies psychiques ? Admettons, mais pourquoi faire appel à nos serviteurs ? Allez plutôt chercher du côté des stations isolées et des avant-postes perdus, qui grouillent d'individus relégués aux confins en raison de leur incompétence ; vous y trouverez trois fois plus de candidats adéquats que dans les manufactorums. La psyréceptivité va rarement de pair avec une capacité de raisonnement rationnelle, et les technoprêtres de ce genre finissent souvent leur carrière dans l'exil. »
languages.original_text: "These things need to be filled with high psi-sensitivity Tech-Priests? Okay, but why use our servants? Look in the remote stations and outposts for those who were banished into the wilderness as unfit, and there you shall find three times as many more suitable candidates than in the manufactorums. Psi-receptivity rarely goes hand in hand with high rationality, and such Tech-Priests often end their careers in the wilderness."

traits.locale_text: « Ces choses ont besoin de technoprêtres hautement sensibles aux énergies psychiques ? Admettons, mais pourquoi faire appel à nos serviteurs ? Allez plutôt chercher du côté des stations isolées et des avant-postes perdus, qui grouillent d'individus relégués aux confins en raison de leur incompétence ; vous y trouverez trois fois plus de candidats adéquats que dans les manufactorums. La psyréceptivité va rarement de pair avec une capacité de raisonnement rationnelle, et les technoprêtres de ce genre finissent souvent leur carrière dans l'exil. »

languages.text: "Diese Dinger müssen mit Techpriester mit hoher Psi-Sensibilität gefüllt werden? Okay, aber warum sollten wir unsere Diener verwenden? Sucht auf abgelegenen Stationen und Außenposten nach Techpriestern, die wegen Unfähigkeit in die Wildnis verbannt wurden. Dort findet Ihr dreimal so viele geeignete Kandidaten wie in den Manufactorien. Psi-Rezeptivität geht selten Hand in Hand mit hoher Rationalität, und solche Techpriester beenden ihre Karrieren oft in der Wildnis."
languages.original_text: "These things need to be filled with high psi-sensitivity Tech-Priests? Okay, but why use our servants? Look in the remote stations and outposts for those who were banished into the wilderness as unfit, and there you shall find three times as many more suitable candidates than in the manufactorums. Psi-receptivity rarely goes hand in hand with high rationality, and such Tech-Priests often end their careers in the wilderness."
